Posts.EditableText:
Try to give us a little more than 3 hours.
It's not like our life revolves around this place you know.
Some of us have JOBS, which require us to go in.. We don't get 2 or more months summer holidays!
SO CHILL!!

... Back on the subject of banning, I can't do that - and I'm guessing the only one/s that can are Alex and MaDbRiT.

And I for one don't remove so many threads/messages. I'd rather remove the content and say so (which I've edited your last message a tiny bit)... So tw'as not I, said the spider to the fly... As he ate him for lunch.

Posts.EditableText: Tron, sorry if I seemed out of line with my impatience.. Its frustraiting for me to wait..(again my problem) So did Stu get a warning or anything? I don't mean to sound out of line or anything.... She sounded regretful in the email she sent me... Is there such a thing as a second chance? If you've never banned davidw, ..how could you ban stu?:lol: The only reason I say this is because I was in the same type of situation when I first got here..Sometimes it's hard being a new person in a different place.. I managed to, for lack of better words 'get with the program and get in line with the style of this forum'. I feel like I'm becoming a better and liked member here. Perhasp a second chance would be in order? ..It would just show how you've given her the benefit of starting over and mending her ways. I'm hoping that she would become a valued member here. She seemed rather spunky and fun. In a way, you've got nothing to lose... If she comes back and breaks the rules, you can always ban her again.. And again, sorry to Tron and to the other MODs.. I was indeed impatient.. I didn't even think about the fact that you guy's have an outside life as well. I'll keep that in mind for the future. thanks for taking the time to read this.
Posts.HTML:

I managed to, for lack of better words 'get with the program and get in line with the style of this forum'. I feel like I'm becoming a better and liked member here.

Perhasp a second chance would be in order? ..It would just show how you've given her the benefit of starting over and mending her ways. I'm hoping that she would become a valued member here. She seemed rather spunky and fun.

In a way, you've got nothing to lose... If she comes back and breaks the rules, you can always ban her again..

And again, sorry to Tron and to the other MODs.. I was indeed impatient.. I didn't even think about the fact that you guy's have an outside life as well. I'll keep that in mind for the future.

thanks for taking the time to read this.

Posts.EditableText:
The picture's just one of a series of PMs me and my good friend Unknown have been exchanging recently. I made some joke about spending the night with his doe and he replied with

[quote:2pji8lyl]You miserable f***. I've had it with you. 

BTW, you couldn't be with Ryori... I was f*** her like the Buck I am.. So get stuffed jackass. 

That's my little doe, so back the f*** off.
[/quote:2pji8lyl]

I then responded that he was, indeed, easy to provoke. He frothed at the mouth some more and then started several little flamewars on the forum.

All very childless, I know, but when someone's as easy to provoke into a full blown temper tantrum as he is, it's hard to resist (particularly in light of the flamings he gives people on the forum).
